title: A sermon of repentaunce, made by Iohn Bradforde
author: Bradford, John, 1510?-1555.
publisher: In Paules Churche yearde, at the signe of the Rose, by [S. Mierdman for] Iohn Wight,
notes: Imprint from colophon; actual printer's name from STC.
"To the Christian reader" dated: The. xii. of Iulie. Anno M.D.LIII,.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
